It's not often I see an actual review in the comments.
If I had a gun with two bullets and I was in a room with Shotacon, Lolicon, and Cuck, I would shoot the cuck head twice and pissing on the corpse while saying "you feel dat motherfucker?!"

The story was great, art style was fabulous, the overall presentation was what I liked the most, there wasn't any blowjob scene however, plus I am sad there weren't any more positions other than missionary and cowgirl, I would've loved doggy style or something but since It Is the authors first time doing shotacon, It Is quite alright. 

The psychological aspect was great In this one, a boy who has to keep a secret from everyone that his teacher has sex with kids, the pressure of that lie must be tormenting, It must've felt great to fuck her more due to that like since If we think about It the kid sub-consciously Is mad that he had to witness that and has to keep It a secret, yet now he can fuck her till he Is satisfied and pretend he Is a part of the lie as well, thus escaping the torment. I liked It a lot, but again, no blowjob scene and no more positions other than the starting doggy style. All In all, 8.5/10, close to a 9 but I hope his next work gets a higher rating.
